title: Awakened and One Blade, One Purpose Mission Are Both Expired
body: After completing **In the Beginning** mission, the two mission after that are both expired. Does this mean I cannot complete the mission?

replies.body: I'm looking over your missions now, and it looks like you've still got those two missions active and available for you to complete. If the client is showing that they are expired, shoot me a quick screenshot so I can see what might be happening.
Thanks for the reply, but now it's available. Perhaps I just need to wait a day or something.  Thanks for the help anyways! :D
